title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Överflöd Pipistrello Supercar Now Available
content:
Celebrate American Independence this week with the Överflöd Pipistrello (Super). While it may be a foreign export, its disregard for safety regulations makes it a perfect cultural fit.

The Pipistrello is a state-of-the-art supercar with a slender build that belies its beastly performance, and is now available to purchase from Legendary Motorsport or at the Luxury Autos Showroom.

It’s also free for GTA+ Members to claim at The Vinewood Car Club through July 31.
